name: ABXY BXYA XYAB YABX
description:
ABXY
BXYA
XYBA
YABX

- This is a game made for the Game'IN Rouen Gamejam -

What the heck is that?

Sincerely I don't know what to say. It's a game with a circle and arrows and it's about pressing buttons on your controler. Each arrows corresponds to a button on your controler / keyboard.

It's not that easy

Difficulty will grow over time. Each 4 success leads you to another level of difficulty. Good luck! 

Oh no why it's spinning?

Yeah it will absolutely spin.

CONTROLS

Controller :

A - Green arrow

B - Red arrow

Y - Yellow arrow

X - Blue arrow

Keyboard :

S - Green arrow

D - Red arrow

Z / W - Yellow arrow

Q / A - Blue arrow

ABXY BXYA XYAB YABX CREDITS

AUDIO / MUSIC / GRAPHICS : Thomas Lebrun (Raivk)

DEVELOPER : Anatole Chaumont (CharlieTU)

I'M A USELESS PIECE OF TEXT!
